item.title: ChatGPT en Neovim
item.description: Instala este plugin https://github.com/dpayne/CodeGPT.nvim Instalando el plugin usando packer en init.lua agregar use("nvim-lua/plenary.nvim") use("MunifTanjim/nui.nvim") use("dpayne/CodeGPT.nvim") Lista de comandos https://github.com/dpayne/CodeGPT.nvim#commands
